about.details:
Incorporated in 1990, Benara Bearings & Pistons Ltd is an ISO 9001:2015 certified company engaged in the manufacturing of engine bearings, bushes, pistons, piston pin, piston rings, cylinder liners and sleeves and engine valves.

They are also in the business of marketing of products like ball bearings, spark plugs, rocker arms, timing chains, connecting rods, valve guides, valve seals & batteries (Motorcycle / Inverter / E Rickshaws) under their own brand which they source through third party contract manufacturing. Company markets its product in OEM and Replacement market.

Company has two manufacturing facilities, which are situated at Sikandra, Agra ("Unit I") where they manufactures piston pin, piston ring and engine bearing and bushes and other one is at Artoni, Agra-Mathura Road Agra ("Unit II") where they manufactures piston, cylinder block / liner and engine valve. Company's products are well known in Uttar Pradesh, Madhya Pradesh, Bihar, Rajasthan, Haryana, Gujarat, Delhi NCR and West Bengal.

faqs.question: What is the Benara Bearings IPO?
faqs.answer:
Benara Bearings IPO is a SME IPO of 5316000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹33.49 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹63 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on March 20, 2018, and closes on March 22, 2018.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Benara Bearings IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Benara Bearings IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Benara Bearings IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Benara Bearings IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Benara Bearings IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: How to apply for Benara Bearings IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Benara Bearings IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
